name: stocky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A stocky person, especially a man, is fairly short and has a body that is wide across the shoulders and chest: The man was described as short and stocky and very strong. Synonyms
heavyset
thickset

Add to word list
(esp. of a man) wide and strong-looking: He was shorter and stockier than I expected.
